key_risks: Regulatory risks due to Chinese government crackdown on private tutoring and for-profit education
Legal challenges from class-action lawsuits alleging securities fraud
Intense market competition from offline and online education providers
Reputation and ethical concerns regarding service quality and student pressure
controversies: Class-action lawsuits alleging securities fraud between April 2018 and July 2021
Criticism over the quality of educational services and pressure on students
social_issues: Pressure on students due to intense educational focus
Criticism over the quality of educational services
governance_issues: Allegations of misleading investors about compliance with Chinese regulations
